name: Amar Para
description: A platform that connects and engages local communities with real-time updates and social features.
responsibilities: Designed and implemented scalable backend APIs with Nest.js.
Developed a responsive and interactive frontend using Next.js and Tailwind CSS.
Integrated Google OAuth for seamless user authentication.
Implemented real-time notifications and event-driven updates.
Collaborated in Agile sprints, conducting code reviews and testing.
achievements: Onboarded 500+ active users in the first 3 months.
Reduced API response times by 30% through query optimization.
Achieved 99.9% uptime using cloud deployment and monitoring tools.

name: Unitracks
description: A full-stack university management platform that streamlines course, student, and faculty management.
responsibilities: Designed modular React components for the dynamic UI.
Integrated backend APIs with Redux for efficient state management.
Implemented responsive design for mobile and desktop users.
Collaborated with backend team to design RESTful endpoints.
Maintained code quality via unit testing and CI/CD pipelines.
achievements: Reduced page load time by 25% through code splitting and lazy loading.
Helped onboard 1000+ students and faculty within the first semester.
Improved user satisfaction scores by 20% after UI redesign.
